**DATE[Sep 29 2007]
**NAME[BBB] is a **AGE[in 60s]- year - old white male admitted with a pulmonary embolus .
He was treated with heparin but the morning after admission , he developed back pain .
We were aware that the patient had an abdominal aneurysm , fortunately because of that we examined him immediately and we had to send him to the OR because the aneurysm ruptured .
Dr. **NAME[UUU] performed the surgery .
The patient did beautifully .
He recovered uneventfully and he is transferred to the Rehabilitation Unit for further care and __________ rehabilitation .
_____________________________________
